TOKEN.description: Auth token to access Home Assistant

BASE_URL.description: Url to reach Home Assistant at

WEBSOCKET_URL.description: Override calculated value if it's breaking or you want something custom. Make sure to use ws[s]://

WARN_REQUESTS_PER_SEC.description: Emit warnings if the home controller attempts to send more than X messages to Home Assistant inside of a second

CRASH_REQUESTS_PER_SEC.description: Socket service will self-terminate the process if this limit is exceeded

RETRY_INTERVAL.description: How often to retry connecting on connection failure
